Flow.description: The Cancellations part of the Cancellations, Transfers, and Substitution. Updated flow to not delete but rather update Payment record.

value.stringValue: Please process the refund and update this task to complete.

recordCreates.label: Move to Unassigned Funds Line Item

recordUpdates.description: Instead of deleting, should update payment record.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Unpaid_Payment_Record
recordUpdates.label: Update Unpaid Payment Record

fields.name: Message_Paid
fields.fieldText:
This registration has been fully paid, with the most recent payment made {!DaysSincePayment} days ago. 


Registration Total: {!Get_Reg_Opp.Amount}


Please select how the funds should be settled.

fields.name: Message_Partially_Standalone
fields.fieldText:
This registration has been partially paid, with the most recent payment made {!DaysSincePayment} days ago. 


Registration Total: {!Get_Reg_Opp.Amount}


Payment Amount

{!Get_Paid_Payment.pymt__Amount__c}


Please select how the funds should be settled.

fields.name: Message_Partially_Bundle
fields.fieldText:
This registration is part of a partially paid bundled registration.


Total for this Registration: {!Get_Reg_Opp.Amount}


Bundled Registration Amount Paid: {!Get_Reg_Opp.Parent_Opp_Paid__c}

Bundled Registration Reminder Due: {!BundledRegistrationReminderDue}


Please select how the funds should be settled.

fields.name: Message_Canc
fields.fieldText:
This registration is {!Get_Reg_Opp.Payment_Status__c}.


The fee for this registration was: {!Get_Reg_Opp.Amount}


Do you want to add a cancellation fee?

fields.name: Refund_Text
fields.fieldText:
Please don't forget to process the refund for {!RefundAmount}.


You can access the payment record here.

fields.name: ContinueText2
fields.fieldText: Updating Opportunity. Click 'Next' to continue.

variables.description: The Attendee record that initiated the change.
variables.name: Attendee
